AssociateFirewallPolicy.name: AssociateFirewallPolicy
AssociateFirewallPolicy.description: Grants permission to create an association between a firewall policy and a firewall

AssociateSubnets.name: AssociateSubnets
AssociateSubnets.description: Grants permission to associate VPC subnets to a firewall

CreateFirewall.name: CreateFirewall
CreateFirewall.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Network Firewall firewall

CreateFirewallPolicy.name: CreateFirewallPolicy
CreateFirewallPolicy.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Network Firewall firewall policy

CreateRuleGroup.name: CreateRuleGroup
CreateRuleGroup.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Network Firewall rule group

DeleteFirewall.name: DeleteFirewall
DeleteFirewall.description: Grants permission to delete a firewall

DeleteFirewallPolicy.name: DeleteFirewallPolicy
DeleteFirewallPolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a firewall policy

DeleteResourcePolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
DeleteResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a resource policy for a firewall policy or rule group

DeleteRuleGroup.name: DeleteRuleGroup
DeleteRuleGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a rule group

DescribeFirewall.name: DescribeFirewall
DescribeFirewall.description: Grants permission to retrieve the data objects that define a firewall

DescribeFirewallPolicy.name: DescribeFirewallPolicy
DescribeFirewallPolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the data objects that define a firewall policy

DescribeLoggingConfiguration.name: DescribeLoggingConfiguration
DescribeLoggingConfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe the logging configuration of a firewall

DescribeResourcePolicy.name: DescribeResourcePolicy
DescribeResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to describe a resource policy for a firewall policy or rule group

DescribeRuleGroup.name: DescribeRuleGroup
DescribeRuleGroup.description: Grants permission to retrieve the data objects that define a rule group

DisassociateSubnets.name: DisassociateSubnets
DisassociateSubnets.description: Grants permission to disassociate VPC subnets from a firewall

ListFirewallPolicies.name: ListFirewallPolicies
ListFirewallPolicies.description: Grants permission to retrieve the metadata for firewall policies

ListFirewalls.name: ListFirewalls
ListFirewalls.description: Grants permission to retrieve the metadata for firewalls

ListRuleGroups.name: ListRuleGroups
ListRuleGroups.description: Grants permission to retrieve the metadata for rule groups

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to retrieve the tags for a resource

PutResourcePolicy.name: PutResourcePolicy
PutResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to put a resource policy for a firewall policy or rule group

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to attach tags to a resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource

UpdateFirewallDeleteProtection.name: UpdateFirewallDeleteProtection
UpdateFirewallDeleteProtection.description: Grants permission to add or remove delete protection for a firewall

UpdateFirewallDescription.name: UpdateFirewallDescription
UpdateFirewallDescription.description: Grants permission to modify the description for a firewall

UpdateFirewallPolicy.name: UpdateFirewallPolicy
UpdateFirewallPolicy.description: Grants permission to modify a firewall policy

UpdateFirewallPolicyChangeProtection.name: UpdateFirewallPolicyChangeProtection
UpdateFirewallPolicyChangeProtection.description: Grants permission to add or remove firewall policy change protection for a firewall

UpdateLoggingConfiguration.name: UpdateLoggingConfiguration
UpdateLoggingConfiguration.description: Grants permission to modify the logging configuration of a firewall

UpdateRuleGroup.name: UpdateRuleGroup
UpdateRuleGroup.description: Grants permission to modify a rule group

UpdateSubnetChangeProtection.name: UpdateSubnetChangeProtection
UpdateSubnetChangeProtection.description: Grants permission to add or remove subnet change protection for a firewall
